text:
And so the thing is that
we meet always new clients.

We understand that we chart
their problems and so on.
We really like and love to hear about their problems

So, you know I have this
solution architect in my team.
This company, big company with a problem,
he made the POC in two days and

that was exactly what
they were looking for.

And say, "Oh, we think
that it can take two months
to realize and you did in two days."
So this is how we are having fun.
